content: विदित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Known, understood, learnt; अविदितगतयामा रात्रिरेव व्यरंसीत् <ls>U. 1. 27.</ls> {@--2@} Informed. {@--3@} Renowned, celebrated, well-known; भुवनविदिते वंशे <ls>Me. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Promised, agreed to. --तः A learned man, scholar. --तं {@--1@} Knowledge, information. {@--2@} Celebrity, fame. {@--3@} Acquisition, gaining.
